name.en: Recette de Spécialité - Chef's Specialty Recipe
name.ja: <ruby>Ｒｅｃｅｔｔｅ ｄｅ Ｓｐéｃｉａｌｉｔé<rt>ルセット・ド・スペシャリテ</rt></ruby>～<ruby>料理長<rt>シェフ</rt></ruby><ruby>自<rt>じ</rt></ruby><ruby>慢<rt>まん</rt></ruby>のレシプ～
name.ja_romaji: Rusetto do Supesharite ~ Shefu Jiman no Reshipu ~

text.en: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated and you control a "Nouvellez" Ritual Monster: Negate the activation, then, if you control a monster Special Summoned by a "Nouvellez" monster's effect, you can destroy that card. If you Special Summon "Hungry Burger": You can banish this card from your GY; Tribute all monsters your opponent controls. You can only use each effect of "Recette de Spécialité - Chef's Specialty Recipe" once per turn.
